title: nf-core/phaseimpute pipeline - params.panel schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.panel

panel.errorMessage: Panel name must be provided as a string and cannot contain spaces

chr.errorMessage: Chromosome must be provided as a string and cannot contain spaces

vcf.errorMessage: Panel file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.vcf' or '.bcf' with optional '.gz' extension

index.errorMessage: Panel index file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.vcf' or '.bcf' with optional '.gz' extension and with '.csi' or '.tbi' extension
